entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
